marklogic.body:
Frankly I don't really understand this post, since you don't make clear whether you are referring to the statements in the article, your "statements" or my first reply; so please accept my apologies if I mis-interpret you. Am I to take it then that, in your eyes, no-one should ever comment on something written or said? Now that's interesting. If "shameless pot" is not an insult, then what is it? Why did you write it? I hardly contributes anything to debate, imho. If I call you a "shameless kettle" how does that advance the discussion? However I will remember that your insults will be more pointed, I'll keep that in my "state of mind".
"rebutt ? refute? Are you joking again all of them are statements and delivered with or without goals." No, I'm not joking. I'm offering you the opportunity to show that any one of "them" are wrong Islamically speaking (assuming that we are talking about the article statements of course).
"If you have problems with those statements thats your Headache why should I worry?" Why indeed? Spoken like a Good Muslim, Interesting. Why indeed should you worry about Islamic aims of world-domination, the subjugation of all non-Muslims, calls to mass-murder Jews, statements about the worthlessness of non-Muslims, use of non-Muslims as "ghanima", sex-slaves etc. After all, I assume that you would expect to get some of the "spoils as well, which are not yet within your Reach but Allah has surely encompassed them [for you]." Of course, it's a bit different from the non-Muslim perspective, but I doubt you can appreciate that fully.
